review: It works fine but does more buffering than other devices I have such as a smart TV or a Netgear

review: So far I have had no issues with it. It is so much easier to use than going through our DVD player to use Netflix and Prime.Even the kids can work it. They love the games. Guess I'll have to purchase a game control so they can play more of them.
author: Tres

review: Very easy to install; works great.  A couple of times I've had trouble streaming Hulu Plus, but more likely a problem at Hulu than with the Fire Stick; signal strength from my router is very good at the point of installation.
author: mathwiz

review: I absolutely love my new Fire Stick. So easy to set up and easy to use. I was able to get rid of my expensive satellite dish and still enjoy great tv
author: Cheryl Spalding

review: I am very pleased with how easy the Firestick was to install and how easy it is to navigate.
